EOI - Lease of Residential Space for PSPC - English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33911/20240211-lease-125779-eoi---en.pdf>

EOI - Bail de Logements Résidentiels pour SPAC - French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33911/20240211-lease-125779-eoi---fr.pdf>

### Overview

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites interested parties to submit an Expression of Interest (EOI) for the potential lease of a residential space that meets the following criteria:

* A single unit with either 2 or 3 bedrooms and 1 energized parking space.
* The proposed space must be located in the Town of Hay River, Northwest Territories.
* The lease term is approximately 5 years, commencing on July 1, 2024.
* The space must satisfy or be capable of satisfying the requirements outlined in PSPC's Standards for Leased Residential Accommodation.

### Key Requirements

* The proposed space must meet the following criteria:
	+ A living room, dining area, kitchen with a full-size stove and refrigerator, and 1 full bathroom.
	+ On-site laundry facilities with a full-size washer and dryer.
	+ Sufficient residential storage space.
* The physical characteristics of the land, building, and surrounding environment must be compatible with the lessee's intended use of the accommodation.
* PSPC reserves the right to early terminate the lease with 90 days' notice prior to the intended early termination date.
* PSPC may install equipment to monitor fuel, water, and electricity consumption in the proposed residential unit.
* The proposed unit must comply with PSPC's Standards for Leased Residential Accommodation, relevant codes, and local laws.
